channel.title: Jujin Kim's blog
channel.description: Recent content on Jujin Kim's blog

item.title: Use Utterances comment at Hugo
item.description: Usually, some blog platforms such as WordPress and Blogger support their own comment system. However, since the comment system needs a server and DB, it is not able to be applied directly to a static web page. So we need a comment service that using an external server and script. There are a bunch of comment systems, We’re gonna take a look the service that named utterances in this post.

item.title: Renewal
item.description: Hello, This is Jujin Kim’s dev&tech engineering blog. Thanks for visiting. Currently this site is under the renewal update. If you come to see my profile page, please click HERE. Thank you.
